exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on flat bench, grip bar wider than shoulders, lower to chest, press up

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, lower bar to upper chest, press up

exercises.name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Secure legs, lower bar to lower chest, press up

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, press dumbbells from chest level to overhead

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees, press dumbbells up

exercises.name: Dumbbell Fly
exercises.instructions: Lower arms out to sides, squeeze back together

exercises.name: Cable Crossover
exercises.instructions: Bring handles together in front of chest

exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.instructions: Lower chest to floor, push back up

exercises.name: Diamond Push-up
exercises.instructions: Hands together in diamond, perform push-up

exercises.name: Chest Dip
exercises.instructions: Lean forward, lower until stretch, push up

exercises.name: Machine Chest Press
exercises.instructions: Press handles forward

exercises.name: Pec Deck Fly
exercises.instructions: Bring pads together in front

exercises.name: Barbell Row
exercises.instructions: Hinge at hips, pull bar to lower chest/upper abs

exercises.name: Pull-up
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, pull chest to bar, lower with control

exercises.name: Chin-up
exercises.instructions: Underhand grip, pull chin over bar

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Pull bar to upper chest, return with control

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.instructions: Pull handle to midsection, squeeze, return

exercises.name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.instructions: Support on bench, row dumbbell to hip

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Hinge at hips, grip bar, stand up, lower with control

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Hinge at hips keeping legs nearly straight, lower bar, return

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.instructions: Pull rope to face, externally rotate at end

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.instructions: Straddle bar, pull to chest, lower with control

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar from shoulders to overhead

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.instructions: Press dumbbells from shoulders to overhead

exercises.name: Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells out to sides to shoulder height

exercises.name: Front Raise
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells in front to shoulder height

exercises.name: Rear Delt Fly
exercises.instructions: Bend over, raise dumbbells out to sides

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.instructions: Start palms facing in, rotate as you press overhead

exercises.name: Upright Row
exercises.instructions: Pull bar up close to body to chin level

exercises.name: Shrugs
exercises.instructions: Shrug shoulders up toward ears, squeeze, lower

exercises.name: Barbell Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl bar from thighs to shoulders, lower with control

exercises.name: Dumbbell Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl dumbbells to shoulders alternating or together

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl with neutral grip (palms facing each other)

exercises.name: Preacher Curl
exercises.instructions: Rest arms on pad, curl bar to shoulders

exercises.name: Concentration Curl
exercises.instructions: Sit with elbow braced on thigh, curl dumbbell

exercises.name: Cable Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl cable handle to shoulders

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdown
exercises.instructions: Push handle down until arms are straight

exercises.name: Skull Crusher
exercises.instructions: Lower bar to forehead, extend back up

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head, extend

exercises.name: Tricep Dip
exercises.instructions: Keep body upright, lower until 90 degrees, push up

exercises.name: Close Grip Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Grip bar shoulder width, press focusing on triceps

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.instructions: Bar on upper back, squat to parallel or below, stand up

exercises.name: Front Squat
exercises.instructions: Bar in front rack, squat keeping torso upright

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat down, stand up

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Push platform away, lower with control

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.instructions: Extend legs until straight, lower with control

exercises.name: Walking Lunge
exercises.instructions: Step forward, lower until back knee near floor, step through

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.instructions: Rear foot elevated, squat on front leg

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl heels toward glutes, lower with control

exercises.name: Stiff Leg Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Keep legs straight, lower bar down legs, return

exercises.name: Good Morning
exercises.instructions: Bar on back, hinge at hips, return to standing

exercises.name: Hip Thrust
exercises.instructions: Upper back on bench, drive hips up with bar on lap

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, feet flat, drive hips up

exercises.name: Cable Kickback
exercises.instructions: Kick leg back against cable resistance

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.instructions: Rise up on toes, lower with stretch

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
exercises.instructions: Seated, rise up on toes, lower with stretch

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold position on forearms and toes

exercises.name: Crunch
exercises.instructions: Curl shoulders off ground, lower with control

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to parallel or higher

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.instructions: Seated, lean back, rotate side to side

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.instructions: Roll wheel forward, extend body, return

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.instructions: Kneel, crunch down bringing elbows to knees

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Support body on one forearm and feet, hold

exercises.name: Pallof Press
exercises.instructions: Stand sideways to cable, press handle straight out

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.instructions: Hinge and swing kettlebell between legs, drive hips forward

exercises.name: Farmer Carry
exercises.instructions: Hold heavy weights at sides, walk with control

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.instructions: Squat down, kick feet back, do push-up, jump up

exercises.name: Box Jump
exercises.instructions: Jump onto box, step down

exercises.name: Battle Rope Waves
exercises.instructions: Create alternating waves with ropes

exercises.name: Turkish Get-up
exercises.instructions: From lying, stand up while holding weight overhead, reverse

exercises.name: Clean and Press
exercises.instructions: Clean bar to shoulders, press overhead

exercises.name: Thruster
exercises.instructions: Front squat into overhead press in one motion

exercises.name: Sled Push
exercises.instructions: Push sled forward with arms extended

exercises.name: Medicine Ball Slam
exercises.instructions: Raise ball overhead, slam to ground with force
